instructions:
The Roll20 Earthdawn (FASA Official) character sheet is optimized for 4th edition, but currently has limited support for other editions. It works OK all by itself, but works best with the Earthdawn (FASA Official) character sheet companion script (The one script works with both the Earthdawn and 1879 character sheets).

For more information please see [Earthdawn Sheet wiki page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Earthdawn_-_FASA_Official).
